antimicrobial.name: Antimicrobial Stewardship
antimicrobial.description: These measures are useful for monitoring antibiotic prescribing to reduce the threat of antimicrobial resistance

cardiovascular.name: Cardiovascular system
cardiovascular.description: These measures are for treatments commonly used for treating conditions affecting the cardiovascular system

centralnervous.name: Central Nervous system
centralnervous.description: These measures are for treatments commonly used for treating conditions affecting the central nervous system

cost.name: Cost Saving
cost.description: Changes to prescribing in this area will result in cost savings

diabetes.name: Diabetes
diabetes.description: These measures are for treatments commonly used for treating diabetes

efficacy.name: Efficacy
efficacy.description: Available evidence suggests that these treatments may not be effective or have more efficacious alternatives

erectiledysfunction.name: Erectile dysfunction
erectiledysfunction.description: These measures are for treatments commonly used for treating erectile dysfunction

eye.name: Eye
eye.description: These measures are for treatments commonly used for treating conditions affecting the eye

gastrointestinal.name: Gastrointestinal system
gastrointestinal.description: These measures are for treatments commonly used for treating conditions affecting the gastrointestinal system

generic.name: Generic prescribing
generic.description: These measures relate to cost saving via generic prescribing

infections.name: Infections
infections.description: These measures are for treatments commonly used for treating infections, including antibiotics and dressings

lowpriority.name: Low Priority
description: This is an experimental list of products
considered a low priority for NHS Funding
we welcome feedback.  These are indicative only, and should be approached with caution

mentalhealth.name: Mental health
mentalhealth.description: These measures are for treatments commonly used for treating mental health conditions

opioids.name: Opioids
opioids.description: These measures relate to the use of opioids

pain.name: Pain
pain.description: These measures are for treatments commonly used for treating pain

paper.name: Mentioned in Papers
description: The below measures have been referenced in papers published by the EBM DataLab team.

reproductive.name: Reproductive system
reproductive.description: These measures are for treatments commonly used for treating conditions affecting the reproductive system

respiratory.name: Respiratory
respiratory.description: These measures are for treatments commonly used for treating respiratory conditions such as asthma and COPD

safety.name: Safety
safety.description: Changes in these measures may result in reduction of the risk of harm to patients
